data.description: Handles land use compatibility and spatial plan clearance. Required for BESS projects to establish development eligibility.

notes.informal_notes: Village council engagement often precedes formal submission to mitigate local pushback. Discretion exists in borderline zoning cases.
notes.symbolic_scaffold: Spatial compatibility often reinforced by public maps, mayoral messaging, or Smart City narrative.
notes.feedback_structure: No public consultation required, but developers may be asked to re-site based on internal review.
failure_modes: Site rejected due to outdated zoning layers
Informal veto from local banjar delaying formal intake
